data.name: Hyperdrive Massacre - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Hyperdrive Original Soundtrack by Aram Jean Shahbazians and Nils Iver Holtar features more than 25 minutes of music created exclusively for the game, fully remastered for this release and with all-new bonus material.

Track List

  • 01. Frag At Will
  • 02. Space Tomahawk
  • 03. Anarchy In Space
  • 04. Event Horizon
  • 05. Gunshots In A Dark Alley
  • 06. Hollywood Is Back!
  • 07. Quantum Decoherence
  • 08. S.D.H.S.

Credits


Composers: Aram Jean Shahbazians, Nils Iver Holtar
Mix: Aram Jean Shahbazians, Nils Iver Holtar

- MP3-format (320kbps) files will be placed in your Hyperdrive Massacre folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Hyperdrive_Massacre\Soundtrack
- Lossless format (Wav, 44kHz, 16bit) files will be placed, compressed in a single zip file, in your Hyperdrive Massacre folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Hyperdrive_Massacre\Soundtrack
